long_description: The men's Quiksilver Pyre 4/3mm Back-Zip wetsuit guards heat for watersports in spring and fall water temperatures. It includes flexible, taped seams and thick neoprene for warmth and comfort. Warmer than a 3/2mm wetsuit, the Quiksilver Syncro 4/3mm Back Zip wetsuit helps reduce evaporative heat loss so you can have more fun on the water. Stretchy 4/3mm neoprene (4mm thickness in body, 3mm thickness in arms and legs) forms to your body for a flexible, comfortable fit; flatseam construction prevents chafing. Rear zipper secures fit and features an extra-long zipper pull; soft neoprene gusset prevents zipper abrasion. Two rip-and-stick tabs at neck seal securely. Brushed chest fabric on interior of suit boosts warmth and manages moisture. You'll enjoy full freedom of motion without chafing thanks to flexibly sealed seams. Tough fabric over knees increases durability. Key loop near back zipper offers a convenient place to store a key. Hand wash the men's Quiksilver Pyre 4/3mm Back Zip wetsuit guards heat in cold water, drip dry out of sun and store in a cool, dry place.
short_description: The men's Quiksilver Pyre 4/3mm Back-Zip wetsuit guards heat for watersports in spring and fall water temperatures. It includes flexible, taped seams and thick neoprene for warmth and comfort.
